translations: 天然的状态；生硬；未成熟

sentences.sentence: You can't indict whole people for the crudeness of a few.
sentences.translation: 您不能因少数人的粗暴行为就控诉整个民族。

sentences.sentence: There is also crudeness in Portuguese popular architecture, reaffirmed by this work.
sentences.translation: 葡萄牙流行的建筑中也存在这种生硬感，我们在这个作品中就能看到。

sentences.sentence: We have run out of suger. without art the crudeness of reality would make the world.
sentences.translation: 没有了艺术，现实的粗陋将使世界变的无法忍受。
